posts.post_content:
Looking to trade or sell these 2 Pirates w/ nice eye appeal, no creases that I can see. Good color on both. Backs are fine. Tiny pencil erased on Abstein hence the low grade. 

For trade, Looking for a VGEX or worse T206 cards that looks Ex or better or high grade '57, 71, 75 BB. OFFERS (or trade.) Thanks, Pat

[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/nollpm/for-saletrade[/url]
Accepting offers would prefer to sell as a 2-fer but would split up. Thanks, Pat

No interest in these? Guess I'll just toss 'em out. Let's make a deal will take '57, 71, or 75 BB or $. 


[url][URL=http://s434.photobucket.com/user/nollpm/media/abstein.jpg.html][IMG]http://i434.photobucket.com/albums/qq66/nollpm/abstein.jpg[/IMG][/url][/URL]

Hey Patrick, I sent an email, thanks!  Cliff
